<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/board/:id"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Write a new board message for a member

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"id","schema":{"schema":{"type":"string"},"name":"objectId","in":"path","description":"ID of the object, this can be a mongo ID but also a plain string (backwards-compatibility).","title":"objectId"},"description":"ID of the object, this can be a mongo ID but also a plain string (backwards-compatibility)."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"description":"Title of the message","type":"string"},"message":{"description":"The message of the message","type":"string"},"writtenBy":{"description":"ID of the member that wrote this message","type":"string"},"writtenFor":{"description":"ID of the member that this message is for","type":"string"},"writtenAt":{"description":"Milliseconds since epoch for this timestamp/date","type":"integer"},"read":{"description":"Whether this message is read or not","type":"boolean"},"supportMarkdown":{"description":"Whether this board message supports markdown","type":"boolean"}},"title":"boardMessagePost"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK"},"404":{"description":"NOT FOUND"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
